name: Technical Support Engineer (Oracle)
description:
Our client, an international company specialising in the integration of Oracle solutions worldwide. They are looking for a Technical Support Engineer for a new Oracle migration and support project for the largest retail company in Thailand.

Opportunities:

  • Competitive salary.

  • Official employment under the Labor Code of the Russian Federation.

  • Full medical insurance after the probationary period.

  • Working with an internationally experienced team on interesting and challenging projects.

  • English lessons with Cambridge FCE certification.

  • Business travel to Thailand.

  • Equipment for the work is provided by the company.

  • Working with the latest versions of Oracle.

  • Professional development within the company: opportunity to grow and develop within Oracle technical support and/or move into internal development (Java) | Data science | Analytics.

Responsibilities:

  • Provide technical support for production and test systems.

  • Knowledge and understanding of the unit/system test scenarios to verify the business logic of new or modified programs and reduce post-implementation failures.

  • Review and analyse functional requirements (Oracle Retail | RMS, RPM, RTS, OBIEE, ReSA, REIM).

Key skills and experience:

  • Proven experience as a technical support engineer.

  • Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science or related field strongly recommended.

  • English at least B1-B2 level.

  • Knowledge of PL / SQL.

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with a wide range of internal and external customers.

  • Positive attitude in challenging situations, responsibility.
